WRITING.TEXT: Let her know she can use both markers and pencils for more detail ;)
You must not have looked hard enough - when I went there was an entire room that was put in to commemorate all of the french and the US's allied history.

Do you seriously think that the entire country is going to be consumed by Islam? I've been hearing it a lot lately, and am genuinely asking if that sort of thing is even possible? I visited France for several months last year and while there were a large amount of muslims, it didn't seem like we're on the warpath to overthrow French culture.
